case.title: Want to chat? - 30 (Bayside)
case.text:
Hey,
30 SWM in Queens. Plans fell through for tonight so stuck at home, The Hangover Part II just ended and now what to watch?!
Figured I would turn to CL to see if anyone is in the same boat!
If you are bored and want to chat, please change the subject to "Christmas" so I know you are real and please include a pic!
Thanks
